body_html:
I'm happy to help as well! To clarify - what source should we use for implementations of the special logpdf? Not sure about licensing issues.

I can tackle the Beta distribution - I recently implemented ~80% of this in CUDA already so it's just a matter of cleaning it up for the new API and thinking about tests / stability.

body:
I'm happy to help as well! To clarify - what source should we use for implementations of the special logpdf? Not sure about licensing issues.

I can tackle the Beta distribution - I recently implemented ~80% of this in CUDA already so it's just a matter of cleaning it up for the new API and thinking about tests / stability.
